botan.cert.cvc.cvc_cert

EAC11 CVC

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class EAC11CVCImpl: botan.cert.cvc.cvc_gen_cert.EAC11genCVC!(EAC11CVCImpl).EAC11genCVC, botan.cert.cvc.signed_obj.SignedObject;
This class represents TR03110 (EAC) v1.1 CV Certificates

const const(ASN1Car) getCar();
Get the CAR of the certificate.

Returns:
the CAR of the certificate

const const(ASN1Ced) getCed();
Get the CED of this certificate.

Returns:
the CED this certificate

const const(ASN1Cex) getCex();
Get the CEX of this certificate.

Returns:
the CEX this certificate

const ubyte getChatValue();
Get the CHAT value.

Returns:
the CHAT value

this(DataSource input);
Construct a CVC from a data source

Params:
DataSource input the data source

this(in string input);
Construct a CVC from a file

Params:
string input the path to the certificate file

this(ref const EAC11CVC other);
Construct a CVC from the copy of another CVC

Params:
EAC11CVC other the other CVC

void opAssign(ref EAC11CVC other);
Assign references to another CVC object

Params:
EAC11CVC other the other CVC object

EAC11CVC makeCvcCert(ALLOC)(ref PKSigner signer, ref const Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) public_key, in ASN1Car car, in ASN1Chr chr, in ubyte holder_auth_templ, in ASN1Ced ced, in ASN1Cex cex, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
EAC11CVC makeCvcCert(ALLOC)(ref PKSigner signer, auto ref const RefCounted!(Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC), ALLOC) public_key, in ASN1Car car, in ASN1Chr chr, in ubyte holder_auth_templ, in ASN1Ced ced, in ASN1Cex cex, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create an arbitrary EAC 1.1 CVC. The desired key encoding must be set within the key (if applicable).

Params:
PKSigner signer the signer used to sign the certificate
Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) public_key the DER encoded public key to appear in the certificate
ASN1Car car the CAR of the certificate
ASN1Chr chr the CHR of the certificate
ubyte holder_auth_templ the holder authorization value ubyte to appear in the CHAT of the certificate
ASN1Ced ced the CED to appear in the certificate
ASN1Cex cex the CEX to appear in the certificate
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator

ECDSAPublicKey decodeEac11Key(ref const Vector!ubyte, ref AlgorithmIdentifier);
Decode an EAC encoding ECDSA key
